DataElement.preferredName: Common Terminology Criteria for Adverse Events Ocular Occurrence Eye Anatomic Site
DataElement.preferredDefinition: A description of which eye(s) the common terminology criteria for adverse event occurred.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Common Terminology Criteria for Adverse Events Ocular Occurrence
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: A standard terminology developed to report adverse events occurring in cancer clinical trials.  Common terminology criteria for adverse events (CTCAE) are used in study adverse event summaries and Investigational New Drug reports to the Food and Drug Administration.  The CTCAE contain a grading scale for each adverse event term representing the severity of the event.:Of or relating to the eye._An instance of something happening, such as an event or incident.

ObjectClass.preferredName: Common Terminology Criteria for Adverse Events
ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: A standard terminology developed to report adverse events occurring in cancer clinical trials.  Common terminology criteria for adverse events (CTCAE) are used in study adverse event summaries and Investigational New Drug reports to the Food and Drug Administration.  The CTCAE contain a grading scale for each adverse event term representing the severity of the event.

Concepts.longName: Common Terminology Criteria for Adverse Events
Concepts.definition: A standard terminology developed to report adverse events occurring in cancer clinical trials.  Common terminology criteria for adverse events (CTCAE) are used in study adverse event summaries and Investigational New Drug reports to the Food and Drug Administration.  The CTCAE contain a grading scale for each adverse event term representing the severity of the event.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition:
any unfavorable symptoms, signs, or disease temporally associated with the use of a medical
treatment or procedure that may or may not be considered related to the medical
treatment or procedure.

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: The organ of sight or vision._Named locations of, or within, the body.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: Left; being or located on or directed toward the side of the body to the west when facing north.: The organ of sight or vision. (On-line Medical Dictionary)

Concepts.definition: Being or located on or directed toward the side of the body to the west when facing north.
The organ of sight or vision.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: Right; being or located on or directed toward the side of the body to the east when facing north.: The organ of sight or vision. (On-line Medical Dictionary)

Concepts.definition: Being or located on or directed toward the side of the body to the east when facing north.
The organ of sight or vision.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: Two entities considered and identifed together.: The organ of sight or vision. (On-line Medical Dictionary)

Concepts.definition: One and the other; relating to or being two in conjunction.
The organ of sight or vision.
